abstract: Moelis & Company, the boutique investment bank, said on Monday that it has hired John T. Grady, a longtime asset management executive, as a senior adviser.
snippet: Moelis & Company, the boutique investment bank, said on Monday that it has hired John T. Grady, a longtime asset management executive, as a senior adviser.
lead_paragraph: Moelis & Company, the boutique investment bank, said on Monday that it had hired John T. Grady, a longtime asset management executive, as a senior adviser.

headline.main: Moelis & Co. Hires a Senior Adviser
